title: (1) of the Schedules to this Order is declared to be protected throughout the State.
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Flora (Protection) Order 2022.
text_raw: 1. This Order may be cited as the Flora (Protection) Order 2022.

title: (1) of the Schedules to this Order is declared to be protected throughout the State.
heading: 2. This Order shall come into operation on the 16th day of May 2022.
text_raw: 2. This Order shall come into operation on the 16th day of May 2022.
text_norm: 2 order shall come operation 16th day may 2022

title: (1) of the Schedules to this Order is declared to be protected throughout the State.
heading: 3. (1) Each of the species, hybrids or subspecies of flora specified in column
text_raw:
3. (1) Each of the species, hybrids or subspecies of flora specified in column 
(1) of the Schedules to this Order is declared to be protected throughout the State. 

 (2) The common name or names of each of the species, hybrids or subspecies 
of flora specified by its scientific name in the said column (1) is set out in column 
(2) of the said Schedules opposite the mention of the species, hybrid or 
subspecies.
text_norm: 3 (1) specie hybrid subspecies flora specified column (1) schedule order declared protected throughout state (2) common name name specie hybrid subspecies flora specified scientific name said column (1) set column (2) said schedule opposite mention specie hybrid subspecies

title: (1) of the Schedules to this Order is declared to be protected throughout the State.
heading: 4. The Flora (Protection) Order 2015 (S.I. No. 356 of 2015) is revoked.
text_raw:
4. The Flora (Protection) Order 2015 (S.I. No. 356 of 2015) is revoked. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 17th May, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [235] 3
text_norm: 4 flora (protection) order 2015 (s.i no 356 2015) revoked notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 17th may 2022 235 3
